text: Dera Ghazi Khan District () is a district in the Punjab province of Pakistan. The city of Dera Ghazi Khan is the capital. ==Tehsils== * Dera Ghazi Khan Tehsil * Taunsa Sharif Tehsil * Tribal Area Tehsil * Kot chutta ==Related pages== *Dera Ismail Khan District Category:Districts of British India Category:Dera Ghazi Khan Division
title: Dera Ghazi Khan District
